page.title: 15SOCIAL SERVICES - ELDERLY
page.content: Social Services held people in the community.Two most important are Home Help and Old People's Homes, Westlands is a home for the dependant elderly in the Cookstown area. It was first opened in 1970 by the County Tyrone Welfare.The Welfare was replaced in 1973 by Health and Social Services Board and Westlands came under the control of Magherafelf and Cookstown unit of management. Westlands is a two-storied purpose built home for the elderly.It accommodates fifty-eight places,this consists of thirty-one single and double rooms.For those who are capable of managing on their own,there are dependant flats,five single and two double. The oldest resident is 93 years of age and the youngest is 55.
